title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: STEM Visual Storytelling Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can creatively express STEM concepts through storytelling using visual metaphors and analogies.
Learners can convert scientific knowledge into educational storytelling content tailored to pedagogical contexts via VR simulations.
By incorporating peer feedback, learners produce and evaluate project outcomes to enhance creative self-efficacy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
